title: Workshop on VR-Based Learning Environment Design and Facilitation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of VR technology and intermediate-level expertise in the sciences
context.additional_context: Enhanced competency in creating and applying science education content using VR devices.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance knowledge acquisition effectiveness by over 20% by optimally sequencing VR animations and auditory texts.
Learners evaluate practical application skills of VR learning content using deep questioning strategies.
Learners can propose three or more VR-text integration strategies following sequence design principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
